arts.ttl: Ruud van Nistelrooy explains why Leicester City are at the 'lowest we've felt'
arts.sum: While City were the better side in the first half, and missed two big chances through Jamie Vardy, they couldn’t sustain their control nor their level of threat in the second period. The drop-off was severe enough that van Nistelrooy said it was hard to argue his side deserved something from the game.

arts.ttl: Thursday's Transfer Talk Update: Tom Cannon, Romain Esse, Nico Williams
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest confirmed transfer news and speculation from across the footballing world.

arts.ttl: FPL notes: Isak + Cunha minutes, Palace assets deliver
arts.sum: Notes from two of Wednesday's games The post FPL notes: Isak + Cunha minutes, Palace assets deliver appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.

arts.ttl: Chelsea transfer news: Embarrassment as Blues may have blocked own Marc Guehi deal
arts.sum: Marc Guehi is a name that Chelsea have been linked with after initially selling him to Palace for around £18m and became their No 1 defensive target in January, but a deal now looks unlikely

arts.ttl: Ruud van Nistelrooy at his ‘lowest moment’ since taking charge of Leicester
arts.sum: The Foxes have lost six games in a row after a 2-0 defeat at home to Crystal Palace.

arts.ttl: Glasner explains half-time talk that sparked win
arts.sum: Oliver Glasner says Crystal Palace’s reaction to a difficult first-half display proved the catalyst for taking all three points in the second at Leicester City.

arts.ttl: Palace beat Leicester with superb second-half showing
arts.sum: Marc Guehi extended the Eagles’ Premier League unbeaten streak to four matches with 12 minutes to play, volleying in the winner after Boubakary Soumare had struck the bar at the other end. Crystal Palace condemned Leicester City to a sixth straight Premier League defeat with a 2-0 win at King Power Stadium.

arts.ttl: Leicester sign defender Coulibaly from Parma
arts.sum: Leicester City have confirmed the signing of defender Woyo Coulibaly from Parma. He will provide additional depth for Leicester who are currently 19th in the table and have lost their last five league matches.

arts.ttl: Report: Crystal Palace star set to leave the club after eight years
arts.sum: Crystal Palace have decided to part ways with Jeffrey Schlupp, according to reports. TBRFootball have suggested that the Eagles player, whose contract at Selhurst Park expires this summer, is liked by Millwall and Major League Soccer (MLS) clubs, including San Diego FC and Charlotte FC. The Ghanaian midfielder could leave before his contract ends in […] The post Report: Crystal Palace star set to leave the club after eight years appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Mateta and Guéhi strike as Crystal Palace extend Leicester losing run
arts.athr: Peter Lansley at the King Power Stadium
arts.sum: Some of the biggest cheers from Leicester supporters all night came when a flag-waving pitch-invader managed to evade several stewards late on before being brought down. Unfortunately for Leicester, that appears to be their direction of travel. Goals in the second half from Jean‑Philippe Mateta and Marc Guéhi enabled Crystal Palace to equal the club’s best unbeaten away record in the top flight of six successive matches, moving them eight points clear of a relegation zone in which Leicester now appear entrenched.
